com.embeddedunveiled.serial.vendor

Class FTOpenedDeviceInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.embeddedunveiled.serial.vendor.FTOpenedDeviceInfo

  • public final class FTOpenedDeviceInfo
extends java.lang.Object

    Represents an opened FT device with information about it.

    Author:
    Rishi Gupta

        Parameters:
        type - device type.
        id - device ID.
        serialNumber - serial number of this device.
        description - description of this device.

        Retrieves the type for this opened FT device.

        Returns:
        type for this FT device info node.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if the type hex string can not be converted into numerical representation.
